name: Grooming Bath Non- Slip Matt
description:
This matting is an optional extra for our customers to put inside their baths. Some people prefer it but we wanted you to have the choice. 

Dimensions- 100cm X 50cm

name: Animelle Stainless Steel Shampoo Holder
description:
This Holder will fit most shampoo bottles and has been designed to fit onto the front or the top back splash sections of our bath

PLEASE NOTE THE PICTURE SHOWS IS SO YOU CAN SEE THE SHAMPOO HOLDER AND DOES NOT INCLUDE THE BATH

name: Animelle Shampoo Starter Kit
description:
Animelle Professional Grooming Shampoo 

Here we have a selection of our grooming shampoo as a starter pack

If you want further information regarding our products please search animelle shampoo and have a look online.

The shampoo included is our IVORY WHITENING / PINEAPPLE BLAST and MEDICATED TEATREE

X 3 LITRES OF SHAMPOO

IVORY PEARL - (whitening shampoo)

Animelle, Ivory Pearl whitening dog shampoo is specifically designed for dogs with all types of light/white fur.
It contains a dual action formula removing dirt, yellow stains and odour whilst rejuvenating hair follicles with Pro-vitamin B5 and Essential oils.
Breakthrough whitening enhancers ensure blinding, show quality results every time. 



PINEAPPLE BLAST  (Deodorizing Shampoo) 

This Fruity Favourite is a wake up call for the senses ! 
It provides deep cleansing action, removing dirt and residue whilst strengthening the coat with a shot of Pro-vitamin B5 and Essential oils.
Odour eliminating technology leaves your dog with a zingy, tropical scented finish.



MEDICATED EUCALYPTUS AND TEA-TREE OIL (medicated shampoo)

Known for it's medicinal properties, this shampoo contains extracts of eucalyptus and tea tree oil. A gentle cleanser, it is the perfect choice for dogs with more sensitive skin. With it's natural anti-bacterial formula it soothes irritated skin and helps repel fleas and other unwanted biting insects with its 
melaleuca oil extracts.




WE ARE CURRENTLY SEEKING DISTRIBUTORS AROUND THE COUNTRY SO IF YOU WOULD BE INTERESTED IN SELLING OUR PRODUCT IN YOUR SALON, KENNELS OR VETERINARY PRACTICE THEN PLEASE GET IN CONTACT. 



IF YOU WISH TO PURCHASE A LARGER QUANTITY THEN PLEASE LET US KNOW AS THIS IS SOMETHING WE OFFER TO GROOMERS 





Please direct all enquiries to sales@animelle.co.uk (office hours: monday-friday 8am-6pm).

name: Animelle dog waiting cage unit
description:
The Animelle Dog Waiting Cage is a safe and convenient way to contain dogs for short periods. Ideal for any busy grooming salon or kennel, this waiting cage is simple to erect, and offers space for up to six cats or dogs at one time. This cage unit features assorted compartment sizes to suit various dog breeds, and the base unit has a removable central divide, allowing each cage to be subdivided for smaller animals. The cage is supplied with a removable rubber floor surface for easy cleaning. 

Self-Assembly Waiting Cage features:

•    Large, self-assembly waiting cage.
•    Features six compartments with fully lockable doors. 
•    Size: 180 (H) x 100 (W) x 70cm (D).
•    Individual cage height: Small 40cm, medium 50cm, large 70cm.

name: Medicated
description:
animell'e medicated tea tree and eucalyptus oil shampoo has been specifically formulated to cleansing and soothing your dogs coat deeply. Containing natural tea tree oil known for its antibacterial properties it soothes and cleanses leaving complete and healthy skin and coat.

Contains -

Pro vitamin B5,
Tea tree oil extracts,
eucalyptus oil extracts,
anti bacteria properties.

Instructions -
wet dog with warm water and apply the shampoo accordingly, leave for 2-6 minutes for the best results and rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes and other sensitive areas, always test it on a small area of the dog first as a precaution.

Manufactured in the U.K

animell'e, 
Knollbury, 
Monmouthshire,
U.K.

www.animelle.co.uk

name: Ivory White Shampoo
description:
animelle Ivory Pearl whitening dog shampoo is specifically designed for dogs with all types of white hair. It contains optical whitening enhancers, ensuring show quality results. It actually removes dirt, yellow stains and odour whilst re-whitening the coat with the essential oils.

Contains -

Pro vitamin B5,
odour eliminates,
anti bacteria properties,
stain remover,
optical brightening enhancers, 
easy wash.

Instructions -
wet dog with warm water and apply the shampoo accordingly, leave for 2-6 minutes for the best results and rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes and other sensitive areas, always test it on a small area of the dog first as a precaution.

name: Animelle Stailness Steel Grooming Bath
description:
The Animell’e professional grooming dog bath has been designed with groomers in mind. It is big enough for any type of dog. It comes complete with a sliding front door and an east acess ramp which is attached to the bath.

EACH UNIT INCLUDES THESE UNIQUE FEATURES:

 - EASY ACCESS SLIDING RAMP

- SINK PLUG HOLE AND WASTE

- RESTRAINING HOOKS FOR OPTIMUM DOG SAFETY

- ADJUSTABLE FEET IN THE BOTTOM 

- EASY ACCESS DOOR

- ANIMELL'E GROOMING SHAMPOO STARTER KIT WITH AN ADDITIONAL 25% OFF YOUR NEXT SHAMPOO ORDER 

- THERMOSTATIC MIXER SHOWER HEAD (FOR ONLY £50 EXTRA)


DIMENSIONS: L=1.2m X W=60cm X H=1m (front) 1.35m(back)  X D=40cm



We can also make them any size or shape, commercial or domestic to meet your requirments, just send us an email to - sales@animelle.co.uk
